title: Sonoma
name: Centre du Vin
directions: At the Ledson Hotel, east side of the Plaza
content: French-influenced bistro located on the ground floor of the Ledson Hotel. A nice patio for dining and people watching. A bar allows for wine tasting of Ledson's two wineries, and bottles of wine are affordable and tasty to order with your meal. Frites topped with blue cheese are a highlight here.
